resources.string: Allows the app to transfer your data via Bluetooth using the accessory framework.
This application can access the wearable device connection status.
The feedback that you send will appear here.
This will end your connection with %s.
The Galaxy Wearable app needs the following permissions.
Tap ASK AGAIN to ask additional questions related to those already posted.
Disconnect your band from the previous phone. In the Galaxy Wearable app on the previous phone, tap the menu drawer, then tap Disconnect.
Bluetooth will be turned on to pair up with your devices.
Can\'t attach more than 5 files. Files can\'t exceed %d MB.
Read and agree to the following:
The operating system on your phone has been modified in an unauthorized way, and is not compatible with the Samsung Gear app. Check your operating system and try again.
Deleting unused files from previous version…
Your device might not appear if it\'s connected to a different phone. Here\'s what to do:
To connect, put the earbuds in your ears, then touch and hold both earbuds until you hear a beep.
Unable to attach file. File already attached.
Can\'t attach the file. File format is not supported.
Couldn\'t send the error report. Select the problem frequency and try again.
Your watch is connected to another device. To connect to this phone instead, go to Settings on your watch, then select Reset watch.

Be considerate and include important details so your consultation is helpful.\10\10Don\'t enter your personal information.\10\10Make sure the Send system log data option is selected.\10\10You can attach a video or screenshot to make your issues easier to understand.
You need the plugin to control your band with the Galaxy Wearable app.
You need the plugin to control your earbuds with the Galaxy Wearable app.
You need the plugin to control your watch with the Galaxy Wearable app.
Your phone may not be able to connect to all watches because it has less than %s of memory.
Do the passkeys on your phone and your watch match? Tap OK on each to pair them.
Remove %d device and associated apps that are no longer needed?
Remove %d devices and associated apps that are no longer needed?
Select devices to remove from your phone.
You\'ll need to reset any removed device before you can connect it to your phone again.
Maximum recording time reached %d seconds. Save recording and add it to attachment.
Unable to open %s in Maximum power saving mode.
Check your network connection, then try again.
Put your earbuds in the case and close it to see whether they\'re charged.
If your earbuds are charged, put them in your ears, then touch and hold both earbuds for 3 seconds until you hear the beep that means they\'re ready to pair.
To connect Gear IconX (2018) earbuds, leave them in the case and press and hold the Bluetooth button.
Don\'t worry! First, make sure your device is turned on.
Unable to send feedback. No text entered.
Can\'t use %s. Delete some files or uninstall apps, then try again.
Your version of Android isn\'t compatible. Check for a software update for your phone and try again.
To get started, check that the numbers below match what\'s shown on your watch.
To get started, check that the numbers below match what\'s shown on your band.
Tap the OK button on your watch.
Allow the following permissions to use this app.
The following permissions are required for the app service.\10\10Required permissions
Location: Used to search for nearby wearable devices through Bluetooth
Storage: Used to transmit and receive the stored files with wearable devices
Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for updating apps and installing plugin apps
Contacts: Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information
Used to download and install required apps automatically.
Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information.
Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Galaxy account information.
Used to search for nearby wearable devices using Bluetooth.
Used to identify devices for updating apps and installing plugins.
Used to send and receive stored files.
Used to get notifications on your watch.
Unable to use %s. Tap SETTINGS, then allow the following permissions and try again:
Bluetooth is turned off. Tap Turn on to turn it on.
Tap RATE RESPONSE to rate the answer you received. Tap ASK AGAIN to ask additional questions related to those already posted.
Samsung Accessory Service has been updated. Restart your phone to connect to your Gear.
Pick the device you want to connect to.
Send system log data to server
Send a system log to help resolve your questions.

To complete the following required functions, we will collect the sensitive personal data specified below:\10\10To listen to the Voice of the Customer and provide you with services, we will collect your Samsung account information.\10\10If you don’t provide us with the sensitive personal data specified above or disagree with our collection and use of such data, the product (or service) won’t function correctly and we will not be able to provide you with the service. Visit https://account.samsung.com/membership/pp at any time and read our Privacy Policy.\10\10By checking the confirmation box, you acknowledge and agree to our collection and use of your sensitive personal data.
Use of sensitive personal data for required functions
Server error occurred. Try again later.
Can\'t attach more than %s of files. Remove some files and try again.

Your system log will be sent to Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd., for analysis. Your system log may contain information from the third-party apps installed on your phone. The system log data will only be used to analyze the problem and improve the app, then deleted as soon as the analysis is complete. Sending your system log using mobile data will increase your data usage by up to %s and may result in additional charges. You can use Wi-Fi instead.\10\10Wait for the system log to be attached before writing the details of your problem.
%1$s will remain on your device even after uninstalling %2$s.

For our global service and management purposes, we may transfer personal data, such as your Samsung account, device information, logs, and information you submit regarding inquiries, to the Republic of Korea. It is possible that the data protection measures and other laws set forth in the country or region to which your personal data is transferred may not be as complete as the ones available in the country or region where you reside. However, we guarantee that your personal data will receive the same level of protection as it does in the country or region where you reside. You may visit https://account.samsung.com/membership/pp at any time and read our Privacy Policy.\10Please specify whether you agree to the transfer of your personal data abroad.
Tap Settings and turn on Location to connect to your watch and sync data.
Additional software (%s MB) could not be installed. There is not enough space in your device storage. Delete some files and try again.
If you don\'t update now, you can\'t continue to use the Galaxy Wearable app.
To connect to all devices, an update needs to be installed.
The %s app will close after the update has been downloaded. Reopen the app to complete the update.
Open the Galaxy Wearable app again to finish the update.
The Galaxy Wearable app will close
On the Apps screen, Tap Settings > Connect to new phone.
If your Gear is powered on but not shown here, go to Settings > Gear info, then select Reset Gear.
